targets.expr: sum(jvm_memory_used_bytes{application="$application", instance="$instance", job="$job", area="heap"}) * 100 / sum(jvm_memory_max_bytes{application="$application", instance="$instance", job="$job", area="heap"})

sum(jvm_memory_used_bytes{application="$application", instance="$instance", job="$job", area="nonheap"}) * 100 / sum(jvm_memory_max_bytes{application="$application", instance="$instance", job="$job", area="nonheap"})

panels.description: Número de requisições no último minuto
panels.title: TOTAL REQUESTS

panels.description: Tempo de resposta no último minuto

targets.expr: rate(http_server_requests_seconds_sum{application="$application", instance="$instance", job="app-admin-do-catalogo", uri!="/actuator/prometheus", status!~"4..|5.."}[1m]) / rate(http_server_requests_seconds_count{application="$application", instance="$instance", job="app-admin-do-catalogo", uri!="/actuator/prometheus", status!~"4..|5.."}[1m])

panels.title: ENDPOINT RESPONSE TIME

panels.description: Duração média de requisições no último minuto

targets.expr: rate(http_server_requests_seconds_sum{application="$application", instance="$instance", job="app-admin-do-catalogo", status="200", uri="/categories"}[1m]) / rate(http_server_requests_seconds_count{application="$application", instance="$instance", job="app-admin-do-catalogo", status="200", uri="/categories"}[1m])

rate(http_server_requests_seconds_sum{application="$application", instance="$instance", job="app-admin-do-catalogo", status="200", uri="/categories/{id}"}[1m]) / rate(http_server_requests_seconds_count{application="$application", instance="$instance", job="app-admin-do-catalogo", status="200", uri="/categories/{id}"}[1m])

rate(http_server_requests_seconds_sum{application="$application", instance="$instance", job="app-admin-do-catalogo", status="200", uri="/genres"}[1m]) / rate(http_server_requests_seconds_count{application="$application", instance="$instance", job="app-admin-do-catalogo", status="200", uri="/genres"}[1m])

rate(http_server_requests_seconds_sum{application="$application", instance="$instance", job="app-admin-do-catalogo", status="200", uri="/genres/{id}"}[1m]) / rate(http_server_requests_seconds_count{application="$application", instance="$instance", job="app-admin-do-catalogo", status="200", uri="/genres/{id}"}[1m])

rate(http_server_requests_seconds_sum{application="$application", instance="$instance", job="app-admin-do-catalogo", status="200", uri="/cast_members"}[1m]) / rate(http_server_requests_seconds_count{application="$application", instance="$instance", job="app-admin-do-catalogo", status="200", uri="/cast_members"}[1m])

rate(http_server_requests_seconds_sum{application="$application", instance="$instance", job="app-admin-do-catalogo", status="200", uri="/cast_members/{id}"}[1m]) / rate(http_server_requests_seconds_count{application="$application", instance="$instance", job="app-admin-do-catalogo", status="200", uri="/cast_members/{id}"}[1m])

targets.expr: sum(rate(http_server_requests_seconds_count{application="$application", instance="$instance", job="app-admin-do-catalogo", uri!="/actuator/prometheus", status="400"}[5m])) / sum(rate(http_server_requests_seconds_count{application="$application", instance="$instance", job="app-admin-do-catalogo", uri!="/actuator/prometheus"}[5m]))

sum(rate(http_server_requests_seconds_count{application="$application", instance="$instance", job="app-admin-do-catalogo", uri!="/actuator/prometheus", status="404"}[5m])) / sum(rate(http_server_requests_seconds_count{application="$application", instance="$instance", job="app-admin-do-catalogo", uri!="/actuator/prometheus"}[5m]))

sum(rate(http_server_requests_seconds_count{application="$application", instance="$instance", job="app-admin-do-catalogo", uri!="/actuator/prometheus", status="422"}[5m])) / sum(rate(http_server_requests_seconds_count{application="$application", instance="$instance", job="app-admin-do-catalogo", uri!="/actuator/prometheus"}[5m]))

sum(rate(http_server_requests_seconds_count{application="$application", instance="$instance", job="app-admin-do-catalogo", uri!="/actuator/prometheus", status="500"}[5m])) / sum(rate(http_server_requests_seconds_count{application="$application", instance="$instance", job="app-admin-do-catalogo", uri!="/actuator/prometheus"}[5m]))
